bug.short_desc: Many F24 texlive packages are considered newer than F25 packages
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem: I tried to upgrade texlive from the F24 version to F25. After the upgrade, I realised a lot of the packages still remained in their F24 versions. After some investigation, I realised that the EVR of (at least some of) these packages were higher in F24 than in F25. This violates the versioning guidelines (https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/Packaging:Versioning) I believe.
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): texlive-2015-24.20150728_r37987.fc24 texlive-2016-17.20160520.fc25
How reproducible: Every time
Steps to Reproduce: 1. Enable F25 repositories on an F24 2. dnf upgrade texlive\*
Actual results: Some of the texlive packages still remained in F24 version.
Expected results: All texlive packages upgraded.
Additional info: To give an example, texlive-concrete has EVR 5:svn15878.0-24.fc24.1 in F24 and 5:svn15878.0-17.fc25.1 in F25.
I knew there was a reason we bump epoch. Bumping it and rebuilding.
texlive-2016-18.20160520.fc25 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 25. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-2fd26db27f

texlive-2016-18.20160520.fc25 has been pushed to the Fedora 25 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-2fd26db27f
texlive-2016-19.20160520.fc25 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 25. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-0d29e349a3
texlive-2016-22.20160520.fc25 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 25. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-871210a6e2

texlive-2016-22.20160520.fc25 has been pushed to the Fedora 25 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-871210a6e2
texlive-2016-22.20160520.fc25 has been pushed to the Fedora 25 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
